mapper.insert: insert into member(memberId, memberPhone, memberName, memberPw, memberPri) values(#{memberId}, #{memberPhone}, #{memberName}, #{memberPw}, #{memberPri})
mapper.select: select memberId, memberName from member where memberId=#{memberId} and memberPw=#{memberPw}

select memberId ,CLUBMEMNO as clubmemNo ,memberName ,memberPhone from( select rownum as rw ,CLUBMEMNO ,memberId ,memberName ,memberPhone from( select a.CLUBMEMNO ,a.memberId ,b.memberName ,case when b.memberpri = 99 then '개인정보 비공개' when b.memberpri = 0 then (b.memberphone) end as memberPhone from club_member a join member b on a.memberId = b.memberId where a.memlevel = -10 and clubId = ${clubId})) where rw between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
mapper.update: update club_member set MEMLEVEL = 2 ,joindate = sysdate where clubMemNo = #{clubMemNo}
mapper.select: select memberId ,CLUBMEMNO as clubmemNo ,memberName ,memlevel as memLevel ,memberPhone ,joinDate from( select rownum as rw ,CLUBMEMNO ,memberId ,memberName ,memlevel ,memberPhone ,joindate from( select a.CLUBMEMNO ,a.memberId ,b.memberName ,a.memlevel ,a.joindate ,case when b.memberpri = 99 then '개인정보 비공개' when b.memberpri = 0 then (b.memberphone) end as memberPhone from club_member a join member b on a.memberId = b.memberId where a.memlevel in(0,1,2) and clubId = #{clubId})) where rw between #{startNum} and #{endNum} order by memLevel asc
mapper.update: update club set preNum = preNum-1 where clubId = #{clubId} and preNum > 0
